name: Pixel
description: Pixel is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a vibrant orange box body reminiscent of retro gaming consoles. Its arms and legs are designed to resemble a playful cat, adding personality and agility to its movements. The screen on its front, also shaped like a cat, functions as the display for various data and visualizations. To top it off, Pixel wears a protective helmet as an additional accessory, emphasizing its commitment to safety and exploration.
